text: Tomalokaka arasye tomalokara dhana-sampada arau nija jirana samparke paraiksa karaa haâ€™ba. Tomalokara purbe yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haichila sihamtara paraa arau musbaraikasakalara paraa tomaloke bahuto kastadayaka katha sunibalai paba. Yadi tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa arau takbaraa aralambana karaa tente niscaya seya haâ€™ba drrha sankalpara kama
